name: Pasito
headline: Personalized employee benefits communication and AI support
description:
Pasito drives participation in all benefits programs (HSA plans, supplemental medical, voluntary insurance, and retirement accounts) with intelligent decision support, segmented communications, and personalized AI support.

The disjointed benefits market is hard for most to understand. We leverage advanced algorithms and data to simplify and personalize the experience for each individual, helping each member of the team to take advantage of their benefits package year-round.

founders.name: Pauline Roteta, Founder
founders.description: Pauline is the co-founder and CEO of Pasito (YC S22). Before Pasito, she was a Senior Investor & Portfolio Manager at BlackRock. Pauline is a Certified Financial Planner®, CFA, Fulbright Scholar, and holds a B.Eng. from Vanderbilt University.

## Benefits education for diverse teams
Increase participation and employee financial wellness **without the product push or human bias.**
[ Schedule Demo ](https://joinpasito.com/<https:/pasito.ai/demo/>)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/video_ap-1024x815.png)
## Pasito is the leading provider of personalized employee benefits communication and support
We connect the dots with AI to deliver measurable impact.
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/checkdot.svg)
## Voluntary Insurance
45% higher elections to supplemental coverage, securing financial protection for workers across industries
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/checkdot.svg)
## Retirement
44% of employees who were not contributing to the plan before Pasito, began contributing within 6 months of launch 
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/checkdot.svg)
## Health Savings
2x more elections and 80% higher contributions to HSA accounts, saving families over $1,200 on medical 
## See how you can deliver personalized benefits education
[ Schedule Demo ](https://joinpasito.com/<https:/pasito.ai/demo/>)
## A better benefits experience, all year round​
## Year-round benefits education
If you only communicate about benefits during enrollment, your employees will forget about them. 
Use Pasito to easily spin up a multi-channel education program aligned to your benefits goals.
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/benefits-me2-1-1024x770.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/benefits-me1-1-1024x770.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/benefits-icon-1-1024x770.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/benefits-front-1-1024x770.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/divider.svg)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/enrollment-me-111-1024x967.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/enrollment-en-1.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/enrollment-front-1.png)
## Annual enrollment
After investing months in fine-tuning the benefits you offer employees, it’s crucial to ensure that effort pays off. 
Use Pasito to facilitate an outstanding educational experience at Open Enrollment for each employee, without the 1:1s. 
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/divider.svg)
## New hire orientation 
Most employees tend to stick with their initial benefit choices, which is why new hire orientation is critical. 
Use Pasito to empower your new hires to make informed choices that lead to greater confidence not only in their benefits but also in their new employer. 
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/orientation-me1-829x1024.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/orientation-me2-1-829x1024.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/orientation-me3-1-829x1024.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/orientation-em-1.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/orientation-f23-1.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/divider.svg)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/s4me6-1-1024x965.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/s4en.png)
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/s4f2.png)
## Employee support
Getting quick and accurate answers to employees’ benefit questions can improve satisfaction with your programs. 
Use Pasito to save time answering benefits questions while making your company’s culture shine. 
## Why we are different
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/magic-wand.png)
### AI-powered onboarding 
Pasito’s AI engine reads your plan documents, accepts data in all formats, and leverages over 1,000 pre-built integrations 
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/stats.png)
### One source of truth
Pasito’s database and analytics power decision support, communications, employee support, benefits guides and more. 
![](https://pasito.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/shield.png)
### Security you can trust
We are committed to the highest standards of data security and privacy. Pasito is HIPAA compliant and SOC 2 certified. 
[ Case Studies ](https://joinpasito.com/<https:/pasito.ai/case-studies/>)
“Pasito has 100% made my life easier. The savings have been great and our employees feel empowered and confident with their benefits decisions.” 
– Megan, HR Leader @ Wyze
## Have more questions?
Chat with us about how you can improve your employee benefits experience.
[ Schedule Demo ](https://joinpasito.com/<https:/pasito.ai/demo/>)

### Pasito: Revolutionizing Employee Benefits Communication

**Overview**
Founded in 2021 and based in New York, Pasito is reshaping how companies communicate employee benefits through personalized communication and AI-driven support. A proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S22, the company is a small yet dynamic team of 15, led by Group Partner Aaron Epstein. The challenges posed by the disjointed benefits market are tackled head-on by Pasito, leveraging advanced algorithms to make benefits accessible and understandable year-round.

**Mission**
Pasito’s mission revolves around enhancing employee engagement with benefits programs, which include HSA plans, supplemental medical insurance, retirement accounts, and more. The company's approach combines intelligent decision support, tailored communications, and personalized AI assistance to ensure employees reap the full benefits of their packages.

**Key Features**
1. **Decision Support:** Helps employees navigate complex benefits choices.
2. **Year-round Communications:** Keeps employees informed about their benefits outside of just the enrollment period.
3. **Employee Benefits Support:** Provides easy access to information and assistance regarding employee benefits, improving satisfaction and engagement.
4. **Benefits Guides:** Offers resources that clarify the various options available to employees.

Pasito enhances participation rates in various benefit programs significantly, with statistics showing a 45% increase in elections for voluntary insurance, and a remarkable 80% rise in contributions to Health Savings Accounts (HSAs).

**Use Cases**
- **Voluntary Insurance:** Increased awareness and participation lead to better financial protection for employees.
- **Retirement Plans:** Enhanced engagement has resulted in 44% of previously non-contributing employees starting to invest in their retirement plans within six months of utilizing Pasito’s platform.
- **HSA Education:** Employees are twice as likely to enroll in HSAs, leading to average savings of over $1,200 on medical expenses.

**Security and Compliance**
Safety is paramount at Pasito. The platform is HIPAA compliant and SOC 2 certified, ensuring the highest standards of data security and privacy.

**Conclusion**
Pasito stands out in the health-tech and insurance sectors by simplifying employee benefits using innovative technology. If you’re looking for a transformative way to communicate and support employee benefits, Pasito is well-equipped to enhance the experience, making benefits both understandable and actionable for your workforce.

For more information, visit [Pasito's website](https://joinpasito.com/).
